description: This file defines API endpoints for managing organization branding settings, including retrieving and updating branding data such as logo URLs, colors, and organization names, using FastAPI and SQLAlchemy.

classes.name: BrandingSettings
classes.description: Schema/model representing branding settings data for organizations.

methods.name: get_branding( org_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve branding settings for a specific organization.

methods.name: update_branding( org_id: int, branding: BrandingSettings, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update branding settings for a specific organization.

ctags.name: get_branding
ctags.signature: ( org_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: update_branding
ctags.signature: ( org_id: int, branding: BrandingSettings, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: User = Depends(rbac_required("Super Admin", "State Admin", "District Admin", "Branch Admin")), )
